animeTitle: Rebirth Begins with Refusal of Marriage Season 2
synopsis: When she woke up from the rebirth, Lin Yaxi returned to the hour before the car accident, and she vowed to change her fate after experiencing the sadness of her previous life. Her marriage and life were sentenced to death by her previous fiancé and Green Tea. In this life, see how she has turned the world upside down. The man who was observing secretly had a special interest in Lin Yaxi. What secrets does this ubiquitous black-bellied man have.
